Class ScoreSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ScoreSystem

  • public class ScoreSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Class ScoreSystem aims at creating, reading and writing score history file. It also include sorting of all score records and retrieving the best three scores for displaying on the screen.
    Author:
    kevingok
